func_sig.description: Calculate the Euclidean distance between two points in 3D space.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance_3d

func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.
func_sig.name: evaluate_expression

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a right triangle given the lengths of the two perpendicular sides.
func_sig.name: calculate_triangle_area

side1.description: The length of one side of the right triangle.

side2.description: The length of the other perpendicular side of the right triangle.
